textEn:
Seoul Bamdokkaebi Night Market 2021 will be held in observance of disease prevention and control measures to offer a much-needed morale boost for small businesses and startups who are experiencing significant hardship due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
 Many efforts have been made to ensure that all night market locations are safe and hygienic with enforced social distancing, mandatory masks, temperature checks, digital visitor logs, etc.
 Visitors are invited to participate in this year’s safe and disease-free night market!
